emails.subject: RE: Australia - One name many regions
emails.to: Jebrane Ben Salem; Support Dnext; Martin Keller
emails.body_text:
Hello Jebrane,

 

Yes, it is fixed. Thanks!

 

Thanks @Martin Keller <mailto:martin.keller@dnext.io>

Sent: Tuesday, July 29, 2025 1:30 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Martin Keller <martin.keller@dnext.io>

Subject: Re: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello Enea, 

 

It's fixed, could you check please.

 



 

Thanks,

Jebrane.

 

________________________________

Sent: 28 July 2025 15:07
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io <mailto:iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io> >; Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello,

 

May you please fix this issue? It is still ongoing

 



 

From: Enea Albertoli
Sent: Wednesday, July 23, 2025 10:12 AM
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io <mailto:iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io> >; Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io <mailto:jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello,

 

On Jira the status is “Resolved” but I see this morning, that we are doing the official analysis for Australia, that the issue is not resolved.

 

For example, for “North West” I can see two regions with the same name, which obviously makes the average soil moisture calculations useless.

 



 



 

https://dnext.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/1/DCS-1529?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0Z3QiOiJhbm9ueW1vdXMtbGluayIsInFzaCI6ImQ0NjJiN2M2NTMwNTk2ZjZhZTc1MjU4NjhjMWViZjc5MzlkOTc4MDNlNjhlMDgzYTJjY2QyNzgzZTM2NGJjOTMiLCJpc3MiOiJzZXJ2aWNlZGVzay1qd3QtdG9rZW4taXNzdWVyIiwiY29udGV4dCI6eyJ1c2VyIjoiMTAxOTIiLCJpc3N1ZSI6IkRDUy0xNTI5In0sImV4cCI6MTc1NTUzMTMxNSwiaWF0IjoxNzUzMTEyMTE1fQ.WriY6SWuEJ7769_xZ4UEmlBSyg5nSWKNY8d_XXXpKJM <https://dnext.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/1/DCS-1529?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0Z3QiOiJhbm9ueW1vdXMtbGluayIsInFzaCI6ImQ0NjJiN2M2NTMwNTk2ZjZhZTc1MjU4NjhjMWViZjc5MzlkOTc4MDNlNjhlMDgzYTJjY2QyNzgzZTM2NGJjOTMiLCJpc3MiOiJzZXJ2aWNlZGVzay1qd3QtdG9rZW4taXNzdWVyIiwiY29udGV4dCI6eyJ1c2VyIjoiMTAxOTIiLCJpc3N1ZSI6IkRDUy0xNTI5In0sImV4cCI6MTc1NTUzMTMxNSwiaWF0IjoxNzUzMTEyMTE1fQ.WriY6SWuEJ7769_xZ4UEmlBSyg5nSWKNY8d_XXXpKJM> 

 

From: Enea Albertoli
Sent: Monday, July 21, 2025 5:34 PM
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io <mailto:iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io> >; Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io <mailto:jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io> >
Subject: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello!

 

One name is used for the same regions in the soil moisture for Australia. This happens also for other regions, not just the one shown.

 

If possible, could we align Precipitation and Soil moisture names, please? You may add the Province to distinguish i.e., VIC - Northern, NSW - Northern, etc.

 

If possible, would it be possible to use the regional names (official), in the photos below for Victoria and New South Wales, please?
emails.body_html:
Hello Jebrane,

 

Yes, it is fixed. Thanks!

 

Thanks @Martin Keller

 

From: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, July 29, 2025 1:30 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Martin Keller <martin.keller@dnext.io>
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io>; Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: Re: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello Enea, 

 

It's fixed, could you check please.

 

 

Thanks,

Jebrane.

 

From: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Sent: Monday, July 28, 2025 15:09
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Martin Keller <martin.keller@dnext.io>
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io>; Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: Re: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello, 

 

Adding @Martin Keller 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>
Sent: 28 July 2025 15:07
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io>; Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello,

 

May you please fix this issue? It is still ongoing

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli
Sent: Wednesday, July 23, 2025 10:12 AM
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io>; Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello,

 

On Jira the status is “Resolved” but I see this morning, that we are doing the official analysis for Australia, that the issue is not resolved.

 

For example, for “North West” I can see two regions with the same name, which obviously makes the average soil moisture calculations useless.

 

 

 

https://dnext.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/1/DCS-1529?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0Z3QiOiJhbm9ueW1vdXMtbGluayIsInFzaCI6ImQ0NjJiN2M2NTMwNTk2ZjZhZTc1MjU4NjhjMWViZjc5MzlkOTc4MDNlNjhlMDgzYTJjY2QyNzgzZTM2NGJjOTMiLCJpc3MiOiJzZXJ2aWNlZGVzay1qd3QtdG9rZW4taXNzdWVyIiwiY29udGV4dCI6eyJ1c2VyIjoiMTAxOTIiLCJpc3N1ZSI6IkRDUy0xNTI5In0sImV4cCI6MTc1NTUzMTMxNSwiaWF0IjoxNzUzMTEyMTE1fQ.WriY6SWuEJ7769_xZ4UEmlBSyg5nSWKNY8d_XXXpKJM

 

From: Enea Albertoli
Sent: Monday, July 21, 2025 5:34 PM
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Iheb Mhamdi <iheb.mhamdi@dnext.io>; Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello!

 

One name is used for the same regions in the soil moisture for Australia. This happens also for other regions, not just the one shown.

 

If possible, could we align Precipitation and Soil moisture names, please? You may add the Province to distinguish i.e., VIC - Northern, NSW - Northern, etc.

 

If possible, would it be possible to use the regional names (official), in the photos below for Victoria and New South Wales, please?

Subject: Australia - One name many regions

 

Hello!

 

One name is used for the same regions in the soil moisture for Australia. This happens also for other regions, not just the one shown.

 

If possible, could we align Precipitation and Soil moisture names, please? You may add the Province to distinguish i.e., VIC - Northern, NSW - Northern, etc.

 

If possible, would it be possible to use the regional names (official), in the photos below for Victoria and New South Wales, please?

emails.subject: RE: Australia - One name many regions
emails.body_text:
Hello,

 

On Jira the status is “Resolved” but I see this morning, that we are doing the official analysis for Australia, that the issue is not resolved.

 

For example, for “North West” I can see two regions with the same name, which obviously makes the average soil moisture calculations useless.

emails.body_html:
Hello,

 

On Jira the status is “Resolved” but I see this morning, that we are doing the official analysis for Australia, that the issue is not resolved.

 

For example, for “North West” I can see two regions with the same name, which obviously makes the average soil moisture calculations useless.
